resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Register here!
Already have an account? Login here!
I clearly understand and accept the Terms and Conditions.

Welcome to Budget Buddy! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the Budget Buddy mobile application ("App") provided by Budget Buddy Inc. By accessing or using our App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the App.

To use certain features of the App, you may be required to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

You agree to use the App solely for its intended purpose, including setting savings goals, making deposits, and tracking your financial progress. Any unauthorized use or modification of the App is strictly prohibited.
Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices concerning the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information.

Budget Buddy is a tool for financial management, but it does not provide financial advice. The information provided by the App is for general informational purposes only. Consult with a qualified financial advisor for personalized advice tailored to your individual circumstances.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. If you suspect any unauthorized access to your account, you must notify us immediately.
The funds withdrawn through the in-app cash out feature are restricted for use within the Budget Buddy App and cannot be used for e-commerce transactions.
You agree not to engage in any conduct that may disrupt or interfere with the functionality of the App or compromise its security.
We reserve the right to update, modify, or discontinue the App at any time without prior notice. You agree that we shall not be liable for any modification, suspension, or discontinuation of the App.
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the App, at our sole discretion, without prior notice or liability, for any reason.
These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Philippine republic.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at budgetbuddy@gmail.com.

By using the Budget Buddy App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. These Terms constitute a binding agreement between you and Budget Buddy Inc.
